page.title: 05WORKING POPULATION FULFORD
page.content: Fulford Primary School made a population study by adding up the number of voters,the children in the school,their brothers and sisters .They found that in the parish of Fulford there were a number of different types of occupations present:- agricultural workers basic services-gas,electricity,water. manufacturing-mainly pottery. construction industry-house building. distribution and catering. Of the 2,430 employed population most work in jobs connected with the pottery industry of Stoke-on-Trent which is the nearest urban area 10 Km. to the N.W. However the area appears very "rural" in outlook even though only 40 residents are directly involved in agriculture. Fulford is a typical dormitory village.
